scripts.lint: prettier --write ./configs && prettier --write ./css/*.scss && prettier --write ./js/404.js && prettier --write ./js/demo.js && prettier --write ./presets && prettier --write ./samples && prettier --write index.html && prettier --write privacy.html && prettier --write 404.html && prettier --write video.html
scripts.build:css: sass ./css/main.scss ./css/main.css && minify ./css/main.css > ./css/main.min.css && sass ./css/presets.scss ./css/presets.css && minify ./css/presets.css > ./css/presets.min.css && sass ./css/404.scss ./css/404.css && minify ./css/404.css > ./css/404.min.css
scripts.build: yarn clear:cache && yarn lint && yarn build:css && yarn build:js
scripts.deploy: yarn build && yarn clear:docs && lerna run build:docs && node deploy.cjs
